entry.title: About
entry.summary: Here you can find all my lecture notes, basically in mathematics and computer science. Generall I updated on 1st and 15th every month, but you can still fetch the latest version by compiling the source. Categories: Lecture Notes Books Papers Notes Enjoy :)
entry.content:
